text_content: Solar Foods has officially opened its first commercial Solein production facility, marking a significant step forward in sustainable protein production. This innovative technology, which creates protein from air, electricity, and microbes, has the potential to revolutionize the way we approach food security and environmental sustainability. Check out our in-depth analysis to learn more about the impact of Solein and the future of vegan biotech. {{GHOST_ARTICLE_URL}}
